sent.orig: I love all Method products for cleaning and was looking forward to trying this one.
sent.trans: 我爱所有的Method所有的清洁产品，并期待去尝试这个产品。

sent.orig: A series of drying method as regular method, supercritical drying method and distillation method was used.
sent.trans: 为了减少在干燥过程中的团聚现象，分别采用常规干燥法、超临界干燥法和共沸蒸馏法处理干凝胶。

sent.orig: A modified harmonic balance method (MH method) and harmonic balance method (EMH method) are proposed.
sent.trans: 提出了改进的谐波平衡法即MH法和EMH法，用于求强非线性系统周期解。

sent.orig: The research Methods: Used in this thesis are document method, comparison method, method and survey-talking method.
sent.trans: 本文所用的研究方法是文献法、比较法、归纳法和调查交谈法。

sent.orig: This text use questionnaire investigation method, literature survey method, interview method, take action method of studying.
sent.trans: 本文运用了问卷调查法，文献综述法，访谈法，行动研究法。
